statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, height FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, date_of_birth, country FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, competition_results FROM athlete_profiles WHERE competition_results IS NOT NULL;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth, height FROM athlete_profiles WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, country, training_history FROM athlete_profiles WHERE weight <= 70 ORDER BY country ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, height, weight FROM athlete_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, country, training_history, competition_results FROM athlete_profiles WHERE country = 'Canada' OR country = 'Australia' ORDER BY country ASC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles;
SELECT full_name, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name FROM AthleteProfiles ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, training_date, training_type FROM TrainingHistory WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE height > 180;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT athlete_id, full_name FROM AthleteProfiles JOIN TrainingHistory ON AthleteProfiles.athlete_id = TrainingHistory.athlete_id;
SELECT full_name, training_date, duration FROM AthleteProfiles JOIN TrainingHistory ON AthleteProfiles.athlete_id = TrainingHistory.athlete_id WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_id, name, height FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_history WHERE duration_hr > 2 AND caloric_burnt > 500;
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, rank FROM competition_results ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_profiles ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC, height DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT athlete_id, name, age, gender FROM athlete_profiles WHERE age > 25 AND weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80
SELECT athlete_id, name, gender, height FROM athlete_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY height DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT athlete_id, training_date, training_type FROM training_history WHERE duration_hr > 2 ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, event_name, event_date, rank FROM competition_results WHERE medal = 'Gold' ORDER BY rank ASC,event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM AthleteProfiles;
SELECT full_name, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, training_date, duration_minutes FROM TrainingHistory ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, competition_name, result, place FROM CompetitionResults WHERE place <= 3;
SELECT id, blood_type, allergies FROM MedicalRecords WHERE blood_type = 'A+' ORDER BY id;
SELECT full_name, gender, height, weight FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT id, full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM AthleteProfiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT athlete_id, training_date, training_type, duration_minutes FROM TrainingHistory WHERE duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, competition_name, result, place FROM CompetitionResults WHERE result >= 9.0 AND place <= 3;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, blood_type, allergies FROM AthleteProfiles JOIN MedicalRecords ON AthleteProfiles.id = MedicalRecords.athlete_id WHERE blood_type='O-' AND allergies LIKE '%Pollen%';
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, last_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, weight FROM athletes WHERE weight > 70;
SELECT athlete_id, training_type, duration_minutes FROM training_history WHERE duration_minutes >= 60 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT coach_id, first_name, specialization FROM coaches WHERE specialization = 'Swimming';
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE height > 180 AND weight < 70;
SELECT athlete_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';

SELECT c.coach_id, c.first_name AS coach_first_name, c.last_name AS coach_last_name, a.first_name AS athlete_first_name, a.last_name AS athlete_last_name FROM coaches c JOIN athletes a ON c.specialization = 'Swimming';
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS num_results FROM competition_results GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING num_results >= 3;

SELECT a.first_name AS athlete_first_name, a.last_name AS athlete_last_name, m.medal_type FROM athletes a JOIN competition_results cr ON a.athlete_id = cr.athlete_id JOIN medals m ON cr.result_id = m.result_id WHERE event_name = '100m Freestyle';
